name: Dream Tail
description:
As I open my eyes, I find myself in a world that is unfamiliar while strangely captivating, so vivid and colorful, yet at the same time, it feels out of reach. I look around and realize that I am not in my usual home, but in a mysterious dream world. 

As I take a deep breath, I feel my instincts take over, as I'm a natural explorer, and can never resist the urge to explore strange new places. I start to run, hoping to find answers about my whereabouts.

Downloadable game for all desktop platforms. We recommend the itch.io app for easy installation.
